Real Madrid have beaten Liverpool to the signing of one of the rising stars in world football, according to a report, as Xabi Alonso gets the better of Arne Slot in a major transfer battle.

Madrid have already signed Trent Alexander-Arnold from Liverpool and are said to be keen on Ibrahima Konate and Alexis Mac Allister as well.

What has been said about Franco Mastantuono
Mastantuono is one of the finest young players in South America and is already an established member of the River first team.
The midfielder, who has earned one cap for Argentina already, has scored 10 goals and given seven assists in 61 appearances for River so far in his career.
Former River and Argentina international midfielder Matias Almeyda has been hugely impressed with Mastantuono and has suggested that he is a generational talent.

Latest Real Madrid news: Sesko offer response, Rodrygo demands
Madrid have been offered the chance to sign Benjamin Sesko from RB Leipzig.
Arsenal are in talks with Leipzig and Sesko, but a Spanish report has claimed that Los Blancos have now been handed the chance to bring the Slovenia international striker to the Santiago Bernabeu.
Madrid have responded to the offer to sign Sesko.
Madrid forward Rodrygo has told Arsenal his wage demands if he is to join the Premier League club in the summer transfer window.
Arsenal are keen on a summer deal for the Brazil international forward and are in talks over bringing him to the Emirates Stadium.
